long_description: Light enough to bring on backpacking trips, the MSR Alpine spatula makes flipping pancakes simple and it won't scratch your nonstick cookware. Serrated edge can be used to cut soft meats and cheeses. Spatula folds open and closed with a simple squeeze of the handle. Weighing less than 1 oz., the MSR Alpine spatula is a good choice for backpacking trips.
short_description: Light enough to bring on backpacking trips, the MSR Alpine spatula makes flipping pancakes simple and it won't scratch your nonstick cookware.
